authorizedSwapExactT4T(address,uint256,u.details: external function to make swaps on AMM using protocol funds, only for authorized contracts

crossBorrow(address,uint256).details: borrow into cross margin trading account

crossDeposit(address,uint256).details: traders call this to deposit funds on cross margin

crossDepositETH().details: deposit wrapped ehtereum into cross margin account

crossSwapExactTokensForTokens(address,ui.details: entry point for swapping tokens held in cross margin account

crossSwapTokensForExactTokens(address,ui.details: entry point for swapping tokens held in cross margin account

crossWithdraw(address,uint256).details: withdraw deposits/earnings from cross margin account

crossWithdrawETH(uint256).details: withdraw ethereum from cross margin account

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CrossDeposit(address,address,uint256).notice: emitted when a trader depoits on cross margin

CrossWithdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: emitted when a trader withdraws funds

factories(address).notice: different uniswap compatible factories to talk to
